subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer started his clay-court season by beating Philipp Kohlschreiber, 6-2, 6-1, with precise shot-making in a 50-minute match at the Monte Carlo Masters in Monaco.
snippet: Roger Federer started his clay-court season by beating Philipp Kohlschreiber, 6-2, 6-1, with precise shot-making in a 50-minute match at the Monte Carlo Masters in Monaco.
